dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.perf.sls.ServiceLevelObjective
dataStructure.description:
Quality goal for a ServiceLevelSpecification defined in terms of parameters and metrics, thresholds, and tolerances associated with the parameters.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceLevelObjective

child.name: conformanceTarget
child.description:
A value used to determine if ServiceLevelObjective is met.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: conformanceTarget

child.name: conformanceComparator
child.description:
An operator that specifies whether a ServiceLevelObjective is violated above or below the conformanceTarget.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: conformanceComparator

child.name: conformancePeriod
child.description:
An interval of time during which the conformanceTarget must be measured.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: conformancePeriod

child.name: thresholdTarget
child.description:
A value that used to specify when a warning should be used that indicates an objective is danger of not being met.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: thresholdTarget

child.name: toleranceTarget
child.description:
A value that specifies the allowable variation of a conformanceTarget.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: toleranceTarget

child.name: tolerancePeriod
child.description:
An interval of time over which the toleranceTarget is acceptable before indication of an objective violation.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: tolerancePeriod

child.name: gracePeriods
child.description:
The number of times an objective can remain un-updated without a violation of a ServiceLevelAgreement in reference to a measurement period and/or ServiceLevelAgreement reporting period.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: gracePeriods

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the objective is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: serviceLevelSpecParameter
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServiceLevelObjectiveExpressedUsing

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceLevelSpecParameter

child.name: serviceLevelSpecConsequence
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServiceLevelObjectiveUnmetResultIn

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceLevelSpecConsequence

child.name: serviceLevelSpecApplicability
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServiceLevelObjectiveiImpactedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceLevelSpecApplicability

child.name: serviceLevelSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServiceLevelSpecIntendsToMeet

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceLevelSpecification
